- DIFICULDADE -
🔲 Não é baseado em dificuldade
🔲 Mamão com açúcar
🔲 Acordou o tico e teco
🔲 "Como você é burro, cara! Que loucura!" - Veloso, Caetano
☑️ Nem quem criou deve entender

- GRÁFICOS -
🔲 Pixels
🔲 Não é gráfico/Não é relevante
🔲 Feio como bater em mãe
☑️ Ta ótimo pra quem não tem essa frescura
🔲 Agrada os exigentes e quase talvez até o chato que não joga se não for a 5000FPS
🔲 Tão bonito quanto um feriadão

- MÚSICA -
🔲 Sorte dos surdos
☑️ Cara, é só música
🔲 Tem bom gosto e combina de um modo geral
🔲 Beethoven não comporia isso nem se não fosse surdo

- História -
🔲 Não tem história
🔲 Nível fanfic de crepúsculo
☑️ Se quiser tem e se não quiser tem também, mas não é obrigatório
🔲 História coesa, faz sentido, gostosa de acompanhar
🔲 Merecia até um livro/série/filme/rpg/documentário

- PREÇO -
☑️ Mais barato que de graça
🔲 Tão barato que parece que foi comprado com o perigo
🔲 Justo como todos deviam ser
🔲 Caro, parece até gasolina
🔲 Só da pra comprar sendo burguês safado ou estando bêbado

- REQUERIMENTOS -
🔲 Roda até no prato do microondas
☑️ Computador da Xuxa
🔲 Da pra tentar no computador do trabalho
🔲 Precisa de um computador atualizado
🔲 Top de linha, principalmente se precisou comprar peças escondido dois pais ou da esposa/marido

- DURAÇÃO -
🔲 "Te amarei pra sempre meu amor" (0 - 4 horas)
🔲 "Esse ano meu time chega na final" (4 - 15 horas)
☑️ "Logo os preços baixam de novo" (15 - 50 horas)
🔲 "Ela vai voltar, espera só" (50 - 90 horas)
🔲 "Continue rendendo desse jeito e vai ganhar um aumento, eim!" (90 - 110 horas)
🔲 Contínuo, dura até acabar, enquanto durar não acabou

- DIVERSÃO -
🔲 Estar entediado é mais divertido
🔲 Melhor ir trabalhar
🔲 Dá uma olhadinha no jogo quando vai dar uma cagada
🔲 Bate aquela vontade de chegar em casa pra jogar
☑️ Desmarca compromissos pra jogar

- DA PRA JOGAR DE NOVO -
🔲 Me arrependo até de ter jogado essa primeira
🔲 Sadomasoquismo
🔲 Foi bom, mas acho que não
☑️ Quem sabe em alguns meses
🔲 Quando acabou, na boa, eu chorei
🔲 Da pra jogar indefinidamente, nem precisa parar

- VALE A PENA COMPRAR -
🔲 Vale a pena pagar pra não ter ele
🔲 Se estiver na promoção, quem sabe
☑️ Claro

Игра топ играл в первый раз. В своё второе прохождение прошёл за пол часа(это из за достижения на камеры).Комнаты конечно дрочево но а так в принципе норм. Кароч если сюда за достижениями то сложность может 7/10.
Groundbreaking gameplay mechanics when it came out and still plays well after all these years. Fun time and cool story to go with it. Should be on everyone's required game list.
it's really short

My cousin and I played this back in 2009, it was storming heavily that night, midnight. I got to the end, the Xbox 360 was running hot. I was hot, it was a very scary night full of rough thunder and intense lightning. We get to the credits… Glados sang, the Cake was a lie… We heard “Still alive, still alive, Still alive!” BOOM, power flash. We were in a state of sheer terror of the house shaking, pitch black, and a very unfortunate power flash at the most opportune time. I have since bought the game on PC but have lived with that hellacious fright since my youth. Maybe some day I will complete it again. Maybe. Puzzle or survival horror? You decide.
10/10 very good game

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!

It's hard to overstate
My satisfaction.

Aperture Science:
We do what we must
Because we can
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying
Over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
'Til you run out of cake.
And the science gets done.
And you make a neat gun
For the people who are
Still alive.

I'm not even angry...
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart,
And killed me.

And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!

Now, these points of data
Make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD I got burned!
Think of all the things we learned!
For the people who are
Still alive.

Go ahead and leave me...
I think I'd prefer to stay inside...
Maybe you'll find someone else
To help you.
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke. Ha Ha. Fat Chance!

Anyway this cake is great!
It's so delicious and moist!

Look at me: still talking
When there's science to do!
When I look out there,
It makes me glad I'm not you.

I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are
Still alive.
And believe me I am
Still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm
Still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm
Still alive.
While you're dying I'll be
Still alive.
And when you're dead I will be
Still alive

Still alive.

Still alive.

My God, what do I say? I mean it's Portal so we know it's good but this was way out of the league for a game released 14 years ago. I will try not to spoil anything but it's quite impossible with a game this good.

The ending was amazing, but then i just felt a sense of dread. The lore is amazing as it's in the same universe as (HL) and the gameplay was even better. It's one of those rare games that promotes brain activity as you have to navigate, realise where you will place a portal, where to put a cube, how to jump to another platform. You have a constant feeling of being watched but as you play you'll realise it can't be farther from the truth.

The villain is truly one of the best in gaming history (not going to spoil but I would say more).

The game comes in The Orange Box and that just makes it all the better as you save money AND you get 2 more games, altho Half-Life 2 has 4 expansions and Team Fortress 2 has the Classic Version.

If you buy Portal standalone, not in the bundle or The Orange Box, you still won't lose money as it is worth it.

Graphics (2007 game) - 8/10
Gameplay - 10/10
Story - 11/10
Lore - 10/10
Difficulty - Moderate
Sequel - (haven't played but I hear it's good so definitely check it out)
Villain - 9/10 (why 9? I gave it a lower score as the villain makes you hate them, this true thing that once presented makes you dread them)

Overall score = 9/10

Recommended and definitely buy it and enjoy!

每每說到益智解謎遊戲，Portal永遠都會在各種推薦名單上面，
但我總是因為出品年代久遠，都沒有實際上摸過這遊戲。
而今機緣巧合下打開了這款遊戲，便知道經典之所以為經典的理由。

主線的19個關卡都不難，基本沒有哪個部分被卡住；
最讓人驚豔的是特殊關卡的六關，將主線的其中六關做了些改動，
去除了一些道具、再加上了些限制，使得原本普通難度的關卡瞬間躍升成地獄難度。
這真的會讓人驚呼：這遊戲原來還能這樣玩？！

10/10。
不給你11/10是怕你驕傲

[h1] 脳が新しい次元に目覚めるようなパズル [/h1]
今となってはこういった3Dのパズルゲームも珍しくはないけど、
リリース日を見ると……15年前という驚きの事実。

ゲーム中でプレイヤーは二箇所を繋ぐことができるポータルを
駆使してパズルに挑むのだが、この空間の繋がりを考えることが
とても面白いパズルになっている。

[h1] 面白い/評価できるポイント [/h1]
[b] ・発想に至るまでの必要な道が丁寧 [/b]
　パズルゲームにおいてプレイヤーが最も楽しさを感じる瞬間は
　おそらく"解法を思いついた時"だと思う。

　このゲームはその解法までのルートが丁寧に示唆されている。
　そのため"よく分からないけどできてしまった時"のような、
　なんとも言えないモヤモヤ感がほとんどない。

　答えを思いつけるよう丁寧に誘導されているが、そういった
　"やらされている感"も感じない作りなのは素晴らしいと思う。

[b] ・エンディングで流れる曲 [/b]
　ゲームそのものの話ではないのだけど、エンディングの曲を
　聴くとなんとなく、とあるキャラクターの性格が分かる。

　曲自体もこのゲームのエンディングらしく、柔らかくも親切な
　雰囲気を感じられるため、一度聴くと耳に残ること間違いなし。

[h1] 総評やまとめ [/h1]
あぁ、なるほど、これは多くの人がオススメというわけだ。
そうクリア後に納得できたゲームだった。
そしてこのレビューを読んでくれた人に伝えたい。

Portalは面白くてオススメだ、ぜひプレイしてほしい、と。
Classic puzzle game with an engrossing soundtrack and late-200s-sarcastic narrator.

THIS GAME IS SO MUCH FUN. it starts off with good puzzles that made me feel clever and then it takes a turn I wasn't expecting. It's great fun to explore the map while also feeling a sense of dread and uneasiness. You never know what you're going to face next. Yea, I'm really enjoying this!

This was literally one of my favorite games I have played so far. I cried like, twice. The end credits were amazing. I love the portal dynamics so much. Honestly, I was originally planning on going straight to Portal 2,  but I am SO glad I didn't and played the first. Going to go play that one, now. I genuinely love this so much.
